name: Balls Bomb - Shoot Big Bubbles
description:
Fun and addictive bubble shoot game!
The classic bubble shooter game that is very easy to play jet hard to master! Once you start playing you wont stop! The goal of the game is to clear all the bubbles on the screen to level up and try to get 3 stars on each level.

HOW TO PLAY ?

- Aim to shoot and match the bubbles.
- Match 3 or more same bubbles.
- Remove bubbles to find cute baby dragons.
- Click on the props in the game, the use of props allows you to progress through the game
- Collect stars in the game, the higher the score the more stars

GAME FEATURES:

- Hundreds of amazing puzzle levels with new challenges.
- Action-packed gameplay. Simple to learn and super fun.
- Plenty of amazing brain teasers, powerful boosts, and free gifts.
- Fun bubble game for the whole family to play and enjoy.
- Free to play and totally addictive.
